Detailed Description

This is a container of nodes and elements and other XML stuff.

bool  FirstTimeUsed = false 
) [protected]

Construct a Declaration using meta data from a TiCPP pointer.

Parameters:
Meta A pointer to a ticpp::Declaration that this class will wrap.
FirstTimeUsed Set this to true if you are instantiating this for the first time, false if Meta is used in another phys::xml::someclass

const String &  Encoding,
const String &  Standalone 
)

Creates a complete Declaration using the provided data.

Parameters:
Version Of XML being Used
Encoding What kind of encoding is this document stored as.
Standalone Is this a Standalone Document? Usually a "yes" or "no". Setting this to "no" is part of assiging an external DTD (currently unsupported).
